title: logs
description: JSON schema for BigQuery table logs

log_index.description: Integer of the log index position in the block

transaction_hash.description: Hash of the transactions this log was created from

transaction_index.description: Integer of the transactions index position log was created from

address.description: Address from which this log originated

data.description: Contains one or more 32 Bytes non-indexed arguments of the log

topics.description: Indexed log arguments (0 to 4 32-byte hex strings). (In solidity: The first topic is the hash of the signature of the event (e.g. Deposit(address,bytes32,uint256)), except you declared the event with the anonymous specifier.)

block_timestamp.description: Timestamp of the block where this log was in

block_number.description: The block number where this log was in

block_hash.description: Hash of the block where this log was in
